attributes.review: As soon as I opened the app, my Alexa started playing a cover of the song “Or Nah” which is a very vulgar and sexual song and it was covered by none other than President Donald J Trump! Can you believe it! He was even hitting the high notes that The Weeknd could hit! Unfortunately the president’s rendition of the song did not stop and I had to curb stomp my beloved Alexa to silence him.
attributes.title: Spying!!!

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to support our wonderful president but it took SOOO long to download and when I could finally open the app it made my phone crash, but I’m optimistic so I tried again and after I opened it a second time it started emitting this awful sound which made everyone around me vomit and get explosive diarrhea
attributes.title: NOOOO

attributes.review: I got this app to try to possibly make myself Start supporting Trump again but all he is it’s a racist, Sexist son of a gun And he should’ve never been able to run for president in the first place because he’s just a little creep. I would put him right next to the tiger king in jail with Carol Baskin you can’t convince me that it didn’t happen
attributes.title: Racist son of a gun

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to see cupcake recipes but the only thing it had was about the oranges mans rallies, and other unimportant events in his very bad life. The fact that people actually rate this app a 5 just makes me think about how greatly our school system has failed us. Anyways, stan Bernie for clear skin and settle for Biden😔.
attributes.title: Lack of cupcake recipes

attributes.review: This app is terrible it only shows the good parts of  Trumbull’s which in nothing and the fact that he is so orange almost mad me blind it’s so disrespectful to know an orange is President I would not download this app trust me all the people he would try to take over your brain to make you support trump terrible terrible terrible 🤮🤮
attributes.title: Terrible don’t download 😡

attributes.review: If I could leave a 0 star I would! It took way too long to download and doesn’t do what it says. I’ve wasted more time trying to figure this thing out than I have with any other app. I would recommend no one waste their time with this piece of crap! Just another terrible thing
attributes.title: Terrible app

attributes.review: This app is so glitchy everything about it is terrible. I just got the iPhone se nothing is wrong with my phone as soon as I got the app it sent a virus to my phone. I had to go to the Apple store online and buy a new phone 10/10  DON’T RECOMMEND. Donald Trump is a phony and the worst person we could possibly elect president 2020.
attributes.title: Sent a virus to my iphone

attributes.review:
I can’t even begin to tell you how many time my new phone froze and then exited out of the app! Every time that I tried to use the app it kicked me out!!! It uses so much battery life it’s insane! I’ve tried everything, and it’s just not working at all. It glitches, freezes, and shuts down! 
Absolutely horrible
attributes.title: ABSOLUTE DISASTER

attributes.review: There I was at trump hotel in the pool at 12:00 am then i downloaded the app. I saw Trump sleep walking to the pool going onto the diving board the tallest one. He dove  so hard he bellyflopped. he bellyflop so hard he made the alarm go off. it sounded like a gunshot. Everyone freaked out but do you know why I freaked out I saw Trump but not his speedo. Also food was bad there one star
attributes.title: Trumps speedo

attributes.review: donald trump is the worst president ever😊 He’s racist, homophobic, transphobic and doesn’t care at all about women and there opinions. So btw if you’re a women out there supporting him just letting you know he could care less about you and your opinion means nothing to him! I thought this app would tell me something good he did but no it just proved how bad he is 🖕🥱😊
attributes.title: donald trump is racist
